text: Eshpai is a surname. It may refer to: *Andrei Yakovlevich Eshpai (1925–2015), Russian and Soviet composer of Mari descent *Andrei Andreyevich Eshpai (born 1956), Russian and Soviet film director, screenwriter and producer of Mari descent *Yakov Eshpai (1890–1963), Russian composer and music teacher
title: Eshpai
